item.title: SSN package tryout
item.description: Load SSN package. require(SSN) Simulate stream network First we simulate 2 stream networks. Sampling sites depicted as black hollow circles and prediction sites as green filled circles. # Delete any old simulations in the working directory unlink("simulated_network", recursive = TRUE) # Generate and save a simulated network my.ssn <- createSSN(n = c(50, 50, 50, 50), obsDesign = hardCoreDesign(c(200, 100, 100, 200), c(0.2, 0.4, 0.6, 0.6)), predDesign = systematicDesign(c(0.3, 0.3, 0.3, 0.
